metadata.title: {{TITLE}}
metadata.description: UI Design PROJECT with MCP tools integration

success_criteria: Visual: Consistent design system following brand guidelines
Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified with Selenium
Responsive: Works on mobile, tablet, desktop
ui_ux_task_sequence: Research & Wireframing: Analyze competitors, create low-fi designs (1-2 days)
Component Selection: Choose shadcn/ui components (0.5 days)
User Testing: Validate with target users (1-2 days)
Refinement: Iterate based on feedback (1-2 days)

mcp_tool_integration.selenium: Visual testing, user flow automation, screenshot documentation
mcp_tool_integration.shadcn_ui: Component library, rapid prototyping, consistent design

project_specific: Always start with competitor analysis using Selenium screenshots
Document every design decision in RAG with rationale
Use shadcn/ui components as foundation, customize as needed
Create automated visual tests for each major feature
Store screenshots and test results in RAG for future reference
